statements: SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate FROM health_metrics WHERE sleep_quality > 7;
SELECT calories_burned FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, sleep_quality, calories_burned FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_rate < 60;
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE calories_burned BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT heart_rate, calories_burned FROM health_metrics WHERE sleep_quality > 8 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate), MAX(sleep_quality) FROM health_metrics WHERE calories_burned > 500 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(calories_burned) AS total_calories FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 100 GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_calories > 1000;
SELECT user_id, sleep_quality, calories_burned FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY user_id ASC, sleep_quality DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 80
SELECT date, sleep_quality FROM health_metrics WHERE sleep_quality < 7
SELECT id, date FROM calorie_intake WHERE calories_burned > 1500
SELECT * FROM health_metrics ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, calories_burned FROM calorie_intake ORDER BY calories_burned ASC
SELECT date, heart_rate FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, heart_rate, sleep_quality FROM health_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY heart_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM calorie_intake WHERE calories_burned > 500 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date FROM health_metrics WHERE sleep_quality >= 8 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM health_metrics WHERE date >= '2021-07-01';
SELECT * FROM heart_rate LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp, rate FROM heart_rate ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sleep_quality WHERE quality > 3;
SELECT id, burned FROM calories_burned WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM heart_rate JOIN calories_burned ON heart_rate.id = calories_burned.id;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate WHERE rate > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(rate) AS average_rate FROM heart_rate WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM sleep_quality WHERE quality < 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, burned, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) AS month FROM calories_burned WHERE burned > 500 ORDER BY month
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM heart_rate
SELECT * FROM health_metrics ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT activity_name, duration_minutes FROM activities WHERE date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT user_id, target_calories_burned, target_sleep_hours FROM goals WHERE target_calories_burned > 500 AND target_sleep_hours < 8;
SELECT id, heart_rate, sleep_quality FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM health_metrics ORDER BY date DESC, heart_rate ASC, sleep_quality DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT users.name, users.age, activities.activity_name FROM users JOIN goals ON users.user_id = goals.user_id JOIN activities ON users.user_id = activities.activity_id WHERE goals.target_calories_burned > 500 ORDER BY users.age ASC, activities.duration_minutes DESC;

SELECT goals.target_sleep_hours, users.name, health_metrics.heart_rate, health_metrics.calories_burned FROM goals JOIN users ON goals.user_id = users.user_id JOIN health_metrics ON users.user_id = health_metrics.id WHERE goals.target_sleep_hours < 7.5 ORDER BY goals.target_sleep_hours DESC, health_metrics.heart_rate ASC;

SELECT users.name, health_metrics.date, activities.activity_name, activities.duration_minutes FROM users JOIN health_metrics ON users.user_id = health_metrics.id JOIN activities ON users.user_id = activities.activity_id WHERE activities.duration_minutes > 60 AND health_metrics.heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY health_metrics.date DESC, activities.duration_minutes DESC;

SELECT users.name, goals.target_calories_burned, health_metrics.sleep_quality FROM goals JOIN users ON goals.user_id = users.user_id JOIN health_metrics ON users.user_id = health_metrics.id WHERE health_metrics.sleep_quality < 3 ORDER BY goals.target_calories_burned ASC, health_metrics.sleep_quality DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT value FROM heart_rate_metrics WHERE id = 3;
SELECT timestamp, quality FROM sleep_quality_metrics WHERE duration > 6;
SELECT * FROM calories_burned_metrics ORDER BY calories_burned ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, steps_taken, distance_covered FROM daily_activity_summary WHERE distance_covered > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM sleep_quality_metrics WHERE quality = 'good';
SELECT date, steps_taken FROM daily_activity_summary WHERE steps_taken > 10000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM calories_burned_metrics WHERE calories_burned BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT id, session_date, workout_type FROM exercise_sessions WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY workout_type DESC;
